TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebAuthenticator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A web navigation API intended to be used for Authentication with external web services such as OAuth.
Docs.remarks: This API helps with navigating to a start URL and waiting for a callback URL to the app.Â Your app must be registered to handle the callback scheme you provide in the call to authenticate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Xamarin.Essentials.WebAuthenticatorResult> AuthenticateAsync (Uri url, Uri callbackUrl);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Xamarin.Essentials.WebAuthenticatorResult> AuthenticateAsync(class System.Uri url, class System.Uri callbackUrl) cil managed

Docs.param: Url to navigate to, beginning the authentication flow.
Expected callback url that the navigation flow will eventually redirect to.
Docs.summary: Begin an authentication flow by navigating to the specified url and waiting for a callback/redirect to the callbackUrl scheme.
Docs.returns: Returns a result parsed out from the callback url.
